title: Chapter 11: Bipedal Navigation with Nav2
description: Navigating in complex, human-centric environments is a fundamental capability for any humanoid robot. For wheeled robots, ROS 2's Nav2 stack is the de facto standard, providing a robust and modular solution. However, adapting Nav2 for a bipedal humanoid presents unique challenges that require significant customization of its core components.
